analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xa3f3664fdedea4635b0056e647bc9f47e8dcc597.sol:
	Contract GOLDCAPITAL has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xa3f3664fdedea4635b0056e647bc9f47e8dcc597.sol#194-195)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xa3f3664fdedea4635b0056e647bc9f47e8dcc597.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xa3f3664fdedea4635b0056e647bc9f47e8dcc597.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xa3f3664fdedea4635b0056e647bc9f47e8dcc597.sol#63-65) is not in mixedCase
